text: Karuna chila musara sampradayabhukta. Atahpara se tadera prati dustami karate arambha karala. Ami take eta dhana-bhandara dana karechilama yara cabi bahana kara kayekajana saktisali lokera pakse kastasadhya chila. Yakhana tara sampradaya take balala, dambha karo na, allaha dambhikaderake bhalabasena na.
